website_summaries.verdict: This warmer makes wipes more comfortable in the summer, but it probably won't noticeably heat them in cold winter climates.
pros: Silicone seal locks in moisture and heat to prevent wipes from drying out
Heats from the bottom, so the whole stack is warm
Night light for easier changing in the dark
Holds more than a week's worth of wipes
cons: Not as warm as other warmers
Be sure to add 1/4 to 1/2 cup of water when you refill to keep wipes from drying out

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT warm wipes.
customer_reviews.text: Wipe warmer? More like a wipe holder. Literally not once have I pulled a wipe out that has retained one ounce of warmness. And yes it’s plugged in. It’s just crap. Soon as I pull it out I have to put the wipe in my bra to warm it while I’m taking off her soiled diaper...huh?! At best it should be called a “wipe moisturizer” as it does a good job at keeping the moisture in the wipe and doesn’t dry them out...just trying to find a positive here. Alas, it does not warm the wipe. Next.
customer_reviews.author: cmiddleton

customer_reviews.title: Bought a second for second baby!
customer_reviews.text: Our first is 22 months and we still use it for her. We have liked it so much that we actually bought a second for our second baby. It is easy to clean and maintain. Our little girl hates cold wipes so it has been a must have for us. If your child doesn’t mind the cold then it probably wouldn’t make a difference for you.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: I've been through couple wipe warmers already and I thought that I would never find a good one until this one came out. First of all, not that it is most important, but it's super cute. It serves the job of the wipe warmer and doesn't disappoint. It keeps wipes warm and not too hot like others. It keeps wipes moist but doesn't overdry or burn like others. Container itself is sturdy so shouldn't break like others. I'm happy, baby is happy, 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this warmer because the opening where the diaper wipes come out is not taut enough, resulting in multiple wipes coming out each time, all stuck to each other, unless you use two hands to extract each wipe. If your baby is anything like every other baby, you do not have two hands available to grab a diaper wipe. So you’ll be stuck with a chain of wipes between you and the warmer, shaking your arm until they separate and then you’ve got wipes scattered around the place and wasted. I ended up getting the prince lionheart warmer instead. It works.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: I would never recommend this but I had to place a star in order to notify the hazardous product.
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my son his wife and newborn. This item started smoking causing the smoke alarms to alert my family something was wrong. It was caught in time before catastrophe happened.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t warm enough to stay warm by the time it reaches baby
customer_reviews.text: I really hate leaving a bad review because I’m too nice, but I’m doing this because the company has to adjust this product and no one should buy it until that happens. Like everyone else, I bought this because it was the highest reviewed wipe warmer on Amazon. I’m telling you, by the time you pull the wipe and go to use it, it’s cold again, because it doesn’t warm it up that much to begin with. I tried it on my chest it was still an uncomfortable cold. Very very disappointed I really wanted to like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ghada Alhaj

customer_reviews.title: Fails at what it’s supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: After searching for a wipes warmer for about a week, finally ended up buying this one. Needless to say very disappointed. The only job it had is to warm the wipes and it fails at it. The wipes stays cold all the time after turning the warmer on for few minutes or several hours. Tried all sorts of troubleshooting. None worked. Assumed turning the light might be the difference but it didn’t worked too. Not sure if i got the defective piece.
customer_reviews.author: Sanketh Yelala

customer_reviews.title: Mine had malfunctions on delivery.
customer_reviews.text: It had a short in the cord when I received it and I had to continually wiggle the cord to get it to start up the warmer. It's just used as a wipe container now since I'm tired of wiggling the cord. One lock latched and the other was loose, never latched. If it all was working correctly itd be a nice warmer but I'm rating low due to my malfunctioning device. Never returned due to having a chaotic home with a toddler and newborn and struggling to find time in the day.
customer_reviews.author: Babyfox

customer_reviews.title: Stupid product
customer_reviews.text: What a dumb device. The product itself stinks of plastic and chemicals. No off switch. After all night plugged in and heated, the wipe on top is mildly warm to my hand, but by the time it touches baby, it's ice cold. Second wipe, less warm, more cold on baby. Worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: From star 1 to 5
customer_reviews.text: Honestly i hated the product few days after the purchase. My water wipes were useless and difficult to pull from the top slot in it. They dried pretty soon and i was alnost ready to toss it out when i went through some of the questions listed here and read about how i can use it better. 2 suggestions changed my review from 1 star to 5 . First - add half cup of water to the diapers. Second- for water wipes that are not continuous, stip locking the upper lid and open it completely to pull a wipe out. Worked extremely well and now i get perfect warm wipes for cleaning my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Priyanka Singh

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Warm Wipes To A Comfortable Temp
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this purchase. The warmer doesn’t even warm the wipes to anything close to a comfortable level. The wipes inside the warmer registered at 67 degrees; the air temperature was 73 degrees; the back of my hand was 87drgrees - I am assuming that a baby’s bum is even warmer than that. While I didn’t expect Turkish towels, I certainly expected the wipes to be comfortably warm, not over 20 degrees colder than my skin.
customer_reviews.author: TooManyDogs

customer_reviews.title: Good if you keep it very full. Not good for cloth wipes.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving 3 stars because this item may work for some people who use disposable wipes and constantly refill the warmer so that it is full and maintaining temperature. I used this with disposable wipes and once the stack was half gone I noticed they weren't as warm anymore. I switched to cloth wipes and was surprised that it didn't really heat them at all since they were at the bottom of the warmer and it heats from the top. The heating element wasn't powerful enough to make this worth my while. I returned it for a brand I had previously purchased and used with my older children that has a bottom heating element.
customer_reviews.author: VAMommy5633

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I debated over whether or not we truly needed this wipe warmer for our twin boys. We had heard differing opinions from many friends and family members on whether or not wipe warmers are worth the money and useful. Ultimately, after reading reviews on Amazon, we chose to go ahead with purchasing this product, and we are so glad we did! This warmer cuts out the cold from water based wipes. With twins, we use the wipes so often we haven't noticed any drying out. They're never too hot. It helps our sons to remain calm during diaper changes. I would buy this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Brielle

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This thing generally works well. Some points I don't care for: 1. The light, though very useful, is not LED. 2. The grabber bits for the wipes tore early during a poo emergency where the wipes fell back inside and I had to reach in one handed. 3. The catches that keep the top on aren't very positive positionally, they kinda slide around willy nilly, which isn't a huge problem so much as a minor annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M

customer_reviews.title: Don’t let the reviews fool you; this is NOT as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is a total disappointment...I got it because of all the reviews but as soon as I started to use it I realized that the wipe is only warm inside of it but the second it hits air it gets cold again. It’s just pointless. And when I say a second; I mean it doesn’t even stay warm long enough to wipe the baby. It’s truly disappointing because I wanted to have something good to say about this and recommend it but I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: MoG

customer_reviews.title: An unnecessary luxury
customer_reviews.text: This unit looks great, works exactly as intended and is a good price for the value. BUT I just have to blame its lower rating on the wipes themselves. The MINUTE you remove a wipe from a heater it is instantly cold. It's the wipes' fault! Now, I do have to say that once or twice I have used a wipe out of the package (not the heater), and my baby granddaughters eyes have gotten very wide when the wipe hits their bottom. They seem to be very aware of the difference between a cold wipe and a heated wipe, even if the difference is barely discernable.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Creason

customer_reviews.title: Too cold
customer_reviews.text: Yes, there was an insert reminding parents that this is not supposed to get them hot, but instead just warm enough to take off the shock of cleaning a baby's butt. They start out that way straight from the warmer, but in the two seconds it takes to get the wipe to the butt, they have cooled off enough that it is still shockingly cold on their behinds. I also have been adding a little bit of water with baby soap, tea tree oil, and lavender to prevent any mildew growth. Warm, moist environments are perfect for fungus and bacteria to colonize. Would love this warmer if it had adjustable temperature controls.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria S.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased, detachable power cord from unit👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Better than my last model... you can unplug this one at the back (so you don’t have to move the dresser and unplug the cord from the wall). The blue plastic in front, making the light blue, is a nice touch and everything works as expected. The silicone piece where the wipes come out is smaller, making rips far less likely (a problem with my last model, if it rips too much then the wipes don’t detach from each other properly when pulled out). To be honest, mine has ripped slightly but it does not affect functionality so I’m not bothered. 🙂 overall, great product for a decent price. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DancerMom

customer_reviews.title: Real review, really like it. Banana
customer_reviews.text: I've been very impressed with this little thing. Works great. Water wipes are perfect b/c they're super watery. For others, just follow the directions and add 0.5 cup of water to the wipes in order for them to stay moist. I labored over all the different brands but I'm very happy I settled on this one. I've had it now for over 6 months and it is still chugging along.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R.

customer_reviews.title: Works but not worth it - nuisance to use
customer_reviews.text: After using this for some time, both the wife and I felt it was not worth it for the hassle of trying to get wipes out of the container. Warmed fine but ended up being more of a nuisance. We also felt in the end this was setting a wrong expectation for the baby, we won’t always have warm wipes available so would rather him be used to how the wipes are without being warmed.
customer_reviews.author: PurchasedFTW

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactorywarmer
customer_reviews.text: I like this warmer, but there are a couple of things that annoy you........1.when you lock the sides so that the base stays down where the wipes poke out, it is not clear if you should have them forward or back, and sometimes it seems it works either way, and then not at all. 2. Also the wipes are very luke warm, within a moment they begin, so I wish they would stay warmer longer. I have nothing to compare it to, and it works ok, is sturdy - it has been kicked off the change table a couple of times and all is well. It is easy to wioe clean and it looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Warm buttwipes ... This the way
customer_reviews.text: If you don't want to shock you baby's behind with an ice cold baby buttwipe, and you want a dispenser that kinda looks like a Mandalorian helmet, this product is for you. Also has a small night light feature. PS. The locking feature i found useless because depending on what brand wipes you use the feeding reliability changes. And you have to open it up.
customer_reviews.author: BRANDY V.

customer_reviews.title: NOT a warmer
customer_reviews.text: Going from the Prince Lionheart warmer to this was really disappointing. Believe them when they say it does not make the wipes hot, not even warm in my opinion. Barely above room temperature When you take them out resulting in wipes that are cool to the touch within seconds. I previously had to Prince Lionheart warmers and definitely think they are worth their price rather than wasting money on what serves as essentially a wipe holder. Unfortunately my husband threw out the box or else I would return this.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie

customer_reviews.title: Get a move on to get warm wipe to baby butt.
customer_reviews.text: There is no temperature control. It’s on or off. At least I don’t see any controls. I understand that wipes aren’t going to be super warm or anything and they do kill the chill but you can’t dillydally. You must wipe immediately Otherwise they cool very quickly. I definitely was disappointed and was thinking of returning it but kept it and I use it whenever I change baby in the bedroom. Was not worth rearranging living room to keep in there which is where we do the majority of baby changing.
customer_reviews.author: Nektaria Ress

customer_reviews.title: Great warmer / Love adding camomile to my water wipes
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My son doesn’t like diaper changes and he hates cold wipes. This warmer has made the experience way better. I use water wipes on it and add some camomile tea on top of them as suggested in the instructions and it has worked wonders for us. My baby has very sensitive skin so being able to add some oils or camomile in the wipes is a nice touch. In general the only problem I see with this product is it’s size but I’m not sure you can find something similar is a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Wish the wipes were a bit warmer but high quality warmer.
customer_reviews.text: I wish this warmer warmed my wipes just a tad bit more.. They are warm but get cold like 3 seconds after you take them out of the warmer and you have cold wipes again. This wipe warmer was a bit more expensive than the other one, so i expected more. It's easy to clean and lock/unlock. Its easy to put the wipes in and the nightlight is great. This also has a life time warranty, so that's awesome too. 4 stars only because i was expecting warmer wipes. I like this warmer because its high quality and durable.
customer_reviews.author: YYY

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for your wonderful product. It's not just for babies
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a friend who was dying and bedridden. She winced every time the cold wipes touched her. After she died tonight I unplugged it. Thank you for your wonderful product. It's not just for babies!
customer_reviews.author: ReluctantShopper

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves this! We use pretty much only at night so he isn’t woken up by cold wipes to the bottom. During the day I use regular wipes, especially so when we’re out and about he won’t be shocked to have a cold/room temp wipe used. But he clearly has a preference for the warmed wipes. He doesn’t cry during the changing when we use these. We followed the easy directions to load 50-80 wipes at a time and pour half cup of water on them when loading. We haven’t had any drying out at all! The warmth is just right, not too hot. This was my one “frivolous” purchase and I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wipe warmer. I was nervous at first because people claimed it dried out the wipes, but we have not had this as an issue at all. The package actually states that if you feel this is an issue, you can add up to a cup of water to the warmer to help. I tried adding water once and it actually made my wipes too wet, so we don’t add any water at all and the wipes are perfect! We actually ordered a second one so we could travel with it and not have to disassemble our baby station at home. We use pampers wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Mel KTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: There’s got to be a better product than this
customer_reviews.text: The dispenser guard broke after 6 weeks of use. It does warm it but wish it had a temperature control so you can crank it up a bit in the winter since it’s like warm and gets cold by the time it touches baby’s skin. Also I’m annoyed that it doesn’t fit an entire Costco Kirkland wipes package, which would be nice. Finally, yes it does tend to evaporate the wetness. Another improvement of this item would be if there was a silicone type seal or something around the lid and it was a little weighted so it would keep the next wipe moist between changings.
customer_reviews.author: Mandnc

customer_reviews.title: Baby's bottom loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought a baby wipe warmer. People told me you dont need one but I still went and got one and so glad I did. My baby is so sensitive to cold wipes so the warmth of the wipes from this dispenser relax her. My one complaint is that the box isn't too good at regulating the temperature. When you just place a full batch of wipes and fill it with water, the wipes are extremely hot. Than when you get through half the wipes, they star to come out almost cold. I'm not sure if you're supposed to keep adding water to keep them warm.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy with product
customer_reviews.text: Baby is so thankful! He’s far less squirmy and no longer fussy when wiping him with warmed wipes. I actually keep the wipes in the original bag for sanitary purposes, you just can’t see when you run out. When I’m about to run out I just place another pack underneath. The only problem which is annoying is the right side lid lock is super loose.
customer_reviews.author: bellaisa11

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not anything special considering cost.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this warmer but the only con is the wipes are hard to get out from the top. We just leave it unlocked and open the whole thing as if replacing wipes and grab them from there then let it shut again. They get wipes warm but it instantly looses its same amount of warmth. I don’t think many wipes hold the warmth long anyways in any warmer once taken out and they definitely aren’t the same as a room temp wipe that feels much colder.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Larson

customer_reviews.title: Great Warmer Option!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to buy this brand after having so much luck with other Hiccapop products and after another brand warmer we used with our oldest quit working. So far so good! High quality and keeps the wipes warmed. We add a touch of water on occasion so they don’t dry out and and a couple of drops of lavender essential oil. Would recommend! The instructions say they recommend Costco wipes because they are cheap and have a continuous feed. We haven’t tried those yet but I know this works well with the Pampers Pure wipes!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: A newborn must have!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It makes the wipes warm. It takes the edge off ,but doesn't make them too hot for the baby. The ice cold wipes at 3 am on my newborn weren't working! We bought this when he was about 3 weeks and he loves them his fussing during diaper changes have decreased dramatically! In fact when we change him if and he's calm or not fully awake he doesn't not startle or scream! This is a great product I should have put it on my registry, but I honestly thought it would have been a waste of money, but the babies actually do better with warm wipes esp during those overnight diaper changes!
customer_reviews.author: Patrice

customer_reviews.title: Decent product with a major flaw, disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This product works well, but the opening to remove the wipes ripped the first time we removed a wipe. The rubberized material is too flimsy and ripped. We used local supermarket wipes that are a bit thick and they tend to stick to each other but for this to rip like this brand new out of the box is not what we expected. Sometimes this rubber piece dries out with the heat and tears, that is why we purchased a new one. Very disappointed with an otherwise decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilio

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice, warm but could be warmer and wipes don’t feed correctly.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kid. It’s nice they seem warmer could be slightly warmer though as I feel soon as I get it out and use it, it cools down really fast but it might be warm enough to him. My only other complaint is it seems like every time we pull a wipe the other wipe doesn’t come feed so we have to open the lid. We have used different wipes to see if that was the issue, same problem. Overall happy with it. It makes it better for my kid. Doesn’t use a lot of electric. Nice little night light. Holds plenty of wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Tiller

customer_reviews.title: Like It Is Supposed To
customer_reviews.text: I like this wipe warmer because it works exactly like it was described. It has made my daughter and new little grandson very happy and that makes me happy. The informational inserts that were packaged with the warmer shows that the company cares about their products not just while they are in the warehouse, but when they get to the buyer/user. I will certainly buy from this company again. Thanks hiccapop
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: That the wipes are warm
customer_reviews.text: They are barely warm. When I pull them out of the well designed case they cool off immediately. Even if I keep them waded in my hand. I use them for myself & I am 67 yr old, with bathroom issues. Terribly disappointed. I would not recommend this for any one. Cord far to short for my use. Can’t use with extension cords.
customer_reviews.author: RCnSamantha

customer_reviews.title: Wipes cool off too fast
customer_reviews.text: I like this wipe warmer well enough. It’s easy to use, I like the nightlight feature, and it’s well made. However, the wipes aren’t very warm and so by the time they make it from the warmer to my son’s backside, they are basically cool again. I suppose the upside is that it doesn’t dry out the wipes, however it almost seems senseless to keep this warmer plugged in since they cool off almost instantly. It’s also pretty large, and takes up quite a bit of space on top of our changing table.
customer_reviews.author: ERO_foto

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: On average, I guess this gives you a warm-ish wipe when you need one. However, there is a lot of variation in the temperature of wipes: some warm (or one side of the wipe is warm) and others not really. Also, and more annoying, this does not dispense wipes very well so I am constantly have to reach in with less than clean hands to fish out a new wipe. Way less convenient than just using the dispenser top that most wipes come with. We ended up unplugging both of these things we bought for the house because we were sick of the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Rich E.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a year and have only used it during winter last year and started using it again recently as it has gotten cold again. I was surprised that it worked after being stored for a bit. I just bought a second one for the babysitter’s home since my daughter has made it known that she appreciates the warm wipes now that the weather has gotten cold. I only regret not getting a second sooner because it does make a difference per my 13 month old (nonverbal) child. Her “ooh” accompanied by no cry is totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MyrAme

customer_reviews.title: A Hassle Wipe Warmer
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used this wipe warmer with both water wipes and honest wipes. This warmer did not dry out our water wipes, but we did notice the warmer did not keep them warm and they were extremely hard to pull out from the top opening. We usually had to unlock the warmer from the sides and take them out from the inside rather than the opening on the top. With the honest wipes we realized this warmer did keep them warm BUT dried them out. With these wipes we were able to pull them out from the top, unlike the water wipes. I wouldn’t recommend this warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good if you by want to increase the temp of your wipes 1°.
customer_reviews.text: After trying this product for a few days now, we will be returning it. I understand that the warmer is not meant to be hot. It is supposed to take the shock out of a cold wipe. But having used it for a few days it doesn't do that. By the time the wipe reached our baby, it's cold. So it doesn't do what it's supposed to do. It needs to be warmer. I didn't buy a wipe warmer to wipe my daughter with a cold wipe, I can do that without the "warmer". I am not sure why this has such good reviews, maybe we got a dud, IDK.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fuentez

customer_reviews.title: Great warmer
customer_reviews.text: We love our warmer so much we bought a second one! This warmer is very easy to set up, just plug it in. It keeps the wipes reasonably warm so you don't burn or freeze your baby. Super easy to clean. We usually just do a wipe down with bleach. It has a light but we don't use that feature really. There is no on/off switch so if you want that feature I'd suggest putting it on a extension strip with one.
customer_reviews.author: S. Long

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job
customer_reviews.text: This gets the wipes warm but dries out the top 2 wipes everytime so I end up having to throw out the first 2 and use the third one everytime. Alot of waste it feels like but it may be the type of wipes because of the length and size. Too much of the wipe may be exposed if the wipes you are using are larger. I have the issue when I use Pampers Sensitive wipes which are a pretty decent size. I do not have the issue when I use Huggies clean wipes which are a bit smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Genny

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking. You found the BEST Wipe Warmer!!
customer_reviews.text: Working on finishing up baby room and it's not complete without this wipe warmer!! The light is great to light up the changing table. Just adding a little water to the warmer is all it needs to keep wipes moist. We do ours once a week to ever other (depending on how often we use the wipes in that room). The wipes are warm but not hot. PERFECT temperature. This warmer is low maintenance. Have tried multiple warmers and was completely disappointed but either the low light, too hot, not warm at all or too much maintenance.. ** This is the Best Baby Shower Gift you can buy **
customer_reviews.author: Judy M

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We've had this wipe warmer for a couple of weeks and so far it works very well. The top wipe can dry out a little but I also didn't add water which would probably help. The one other thing I don't like is that the hole where the wipes pull out doesn't really grab tight enough so there is a tendency for more than one wipe to come out and sometimes needing two hands to tear it. It does what it's supposed to though so we're fine with it so far!
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: A Keeper
customer_reviews.text: This wipe warmer actually does a nice job on keeping them warm. I like how upfront the company is about what to expect with the temperature. They are right it’s NOT hot but warm the moment you pull one out. The key is to use it right away if you are concern about them getting cold so quickly. Once you leave it out for few seconds you lose the warmth. Compare to the other wipe warmer I had, this one is a keeper. It’s still doing the job and my little one is 8 months Update 8/2019: My little one is 17 months and the wipe warmer is still doing the job. This was a good investment and quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Micheline

customer_reviews.title: Great always on wipe warmer
customer_reviews.text: Love this wipes warmer. Have had it for a long time now and still working. Big enough to hold about 100 disposable wipes and is always on meaning you always have a warm wipe handy. The button on top only activates the nightlight for about 10 min, have to unplug to turn off but you dont need to. As long as you remember to add 1/2 cup of water when refilling, the wipes wont ever dry out.
customer_reviews.author: d3r3kkj

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE for new parents!
customer_reviews.text: I used to think wipe warmers were the dumbest baby gimmicks out there. That is until I had a newborn who screamed her head off at every diaper change and hated the feeling of cold wipes on her sensitive skin. This diaper warmer was a life safer. As long as you keep it moisturized with water and follow all of the directions, the durability is great and is much safer and reliable than I expected. It even has a cool night light for middle of the night changes. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: hard to find time for other stuff such as writing this review. I'll make this short. this product works. I bought this for the new baby. The baby started crying, and its because the wipes are cold for the sensitive baby. As they said in the features, this makes the wipes WARM. The wipes are not Hot, for you dont want to put hot wipes to your baby anyway. The wipes are warm enough to the amount that your baby would appreciate. You would too. to sum this up, this product works. buy it. Bought sept 2018 Update. 03/2020. Still works great. Still recommending to people to buy it
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: A late night must have
customer_reviews.text: We love this product. Our newborn hated cold wipes and would scream during late night feedings. Of course this would always making falling back asleep a challenge. We would always run the wipes under hot water, but that usually complicated the process of going to sleep as well. So, I decided to go ahead and get this and I’m so happy we did! Best decision ever. Our little guy loves the warm wipes. We use Hello Bello wipes and it works well. The temperature is just right and they stay moist. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Galaxygurl

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Water Wipes
customer_reviews.text: This warmer works great! But it is particularly perfect if you use the Water Wipes brand. Since these wipes do not have the continuous pull you have to be able to easily lift the lid, rather than using the pull through. Additionally it needs the seal to last when doing this so that your wipes don't dry out! We tried other brand warmers and either had a hard time trying to get it open or had our wipes dry out. We've since purchased two of these, the temperature is perfect and our boys are very happy to not have cold wipes!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm wipes.
customer_reviews.text: This warmer has worked out great for us. My son absolutely hates cold wipes. We were using the Munchkin warmer before but stopped using it because the wall adapter was getting very hot and becoming a potential fire hazard. I have been using this warmer for a few months and have also been checking the adapter and so far we have not had any problems. The wipes come out nice and warm and keep their moisture. The opening where you pull out the wipes is kind of flimsy but other than that we are very happy with this warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Adela

customer_reviews.title: It's Not a luxury buy when you have a sensitive kid
customer_reviews.text: Some internet writers and maybe your friends and family will tell you a wipe warmer is something you don't need--that it's excessive. We listened to this and struggled through diaper changes with our son for about a year--he would kick and clench when we went to wipe him. I bought this warmer out of desperation and because of the high reviews and its compatibility with water wipes. It's a world of difference. He stopped yelling and kicking and diaper changes are not dreaded anymore. I couldn't be happier and I'm sorry I didn't listen to my gut(and my kid) sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Mathmiss

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: We used to have a Prince Lionheart wipe warmer which required us to purchase a separate pad every so often to help keep the wipes wet. I liked that this warmer didn't need any of that. The nighlight is nice to have, but we don't use it often. We only turn it on to check the amount of wipes left. The wipes will stay warm longer after you take them out if you keep them balled-up.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought two of these four my dad who wears diapers for incontinence. He lives in a care facility and would get a little irritated when the care staff cleaned him up. Once I got these, the irritability went down. They warm up quickly and well. They are a little smaller than the words I like to buy for him but they still fit and feed through the top easily enough. The ones I buy are the Sam's club wipes in the purple box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a wipe warmer
customer_reviews.text: It locked well and the light was a nice function but the wipe warmer didn’t do what it was made for. It didn’t warm the wipes at all and every time I grabbed one from the container they came out cold.
customer_reviews.author: sbarr

customer_reviews.title: Great wipe warmer
customer_reviews.text: Great wipe warmer, just wish it had an on/off switch. They also need a line indicator for how much water to put in. I filled it past the viewing window and water started coming out of the edges. So that's how I learned how much water I can put it. The wipe warmer takes a while to get warm the first time but once it get's going the wipes stay slightly warm for a while. The wipes also stay very moist thanks to the water, but any wipes that are near the silicone seal will dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest

customer_reviews.title: Bottoms warmed
customer_reviews.text: I give this an overall rating of 3. Definitely works best with continuous wipes. Being able to see the level of wipes externally is a plus. The locking feature seems a bit on the loose side. I find that it often unlocks. I expected the wipes to stay warmer a little longer but did not impact my rating. I have found that once the wipes get to a lower level there will be problems if they do not have enough length to maintain the continuous feed.
customer_reviews.author: Minpins Rule

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on reviews, but was very disappointed. This thing barely even changes the temp of the wipes. The lock feature slides too easily so most the time it doesn't even heat them at all and when it does its not worth what I paid for this. I now own a bulky wipe holder. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal

customer_reviews.title: Toasty Baby Bottom
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 I was so impressed with the 1st one. I followed the instructions, so that helped. I put a stack of baby wipes in, poured in enough water to keep them moist and let them sit. About maybe 30/40 mins later they were warm and toasty. I havent put the warmer component on in a couple of weeks and they still have managed to stay very moist. I HIGHLY recommend this wipe warmer. Also it has a cute little night light. *I do NOT suggest adding a lot of water, the wipes will be soaking wet and youll have to squeeze the extra water out*
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick to keep wipes warm!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for over a month and refilled it twice already. Yes Rebecca does go a lot. We’ve been pleased with this warmer. We fill it with Store bought baby wipes and add a little of water. Keeps the wipes warm. Just note if you pack it tight with wipes it’s a bit tough to pull out the wipes as it’s a tight fit. So would recommend fill it 3/4 of the way with wipes. So far happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Javier Y

customer_reviews.title: Works well for cloth wipes
customer_reviews.text: We loaded this up first with amazon basics wipes, then with cloth wipes. It works well with both. For the cloth, I use grow via and roll them up into little cylinders. 8 of those will fit in two layers, then I pour some tap water over the top. It gets wiped out with bleach every 3-4 weeks, and we’ve never seen any mold. Just like to keep it smelling fresh. Warm wipes changed the life of our chilly January shut-down baby. He stopped screaming when his diaper got changed, and also solved the problem of how to use cloth wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle mom

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I purchased a wipe warmer, it makes me feel better when we have to change baby's diapers and I know we're not wiping him with cold wipes, especially at night. The lock mechanism sometimes is a bit tricky to lock, but not too tricky. When you're ready to wipe, then you have to use the wipe fast because it cools off really fast. Overall I'm satisfied with the purchase and have recommended it to my sister who also has a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia M

customer_reviews.title: No more cold bum
customer_reviews.text: Before my baby arrived I never thought I would use a wipe warmer, but I soon learned how much the shock of a cold wipe seemed to startle him. Because I wanted added comfort for my baby I decided to purchase one, and I’m so glad I got this one. It looks nice and keeps the wipes at a perfect temperature. It keeps the moisture in, and I don’t have to add extra water to keep the wipes soft and moist. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Gillian

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: All in all it did have a positive impact on diaper change time. There are couple of things that you hav to do using it though. Add water to make wipes moist enough. Keep the wipe pile stocked enough, small amount will result in cold wipes, as the warmer doesn't reach lover level of the box. Also, the lid that feeds the dipers- separates them at all time, so I just end up opening the whole thing every single time I need a wipe. Otherwise I am happy with the purchase and I would recommend it to everyone
customer_reviews.author: VYTAUTAS  ATKOCAITIS

customer_reviews.title: Works best with water wipes.
customer_reviews.text: Works best with water wipes. We tried other baby wipes, but those did not stay warm which makes a big difference in avoiding those occasional messes. Only con is that the unlock feature is not that easy to open especially trying to keep one hand on baby. My wife and I just leave it unlocked and open it up to get to the water wipes, which is a lot easier especially for those bigger messes.
customer_reviews.author: Drakhaoul

customer_reviews.title: Not a great light but awesome warmer!
customer_reviews.text: This warmer is awesome!! I use it mainly at night, and it makes changing so much easier as my baby likes the warm wipes while sleepy and it's not a shock. There have been a few reviews with temperature control and burnt wipes, but I've not had any issues and I've been using this for 3 months now. The nightlight is pretty useless as it's not very bright if using by itself, but handy to turn on to check how many wipes you have left. The locks on the side that keep the container closed come lose occasionally but you just click them back into place, so it's not really a big deal for me personally.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Favorite wipe warmer, but could use improvement
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this warmer for almost a year and I absolutely love it. The only issue that I have is the silicone/rubber piece where you pull the wipes from has torn (it did that with my first one and the company replaced it, no questions asked.) so now I have to open the lid every time I want a wipe because my wipes won’t stay. That part could use some improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Flap ripped, but it still works and the wipes stay damp!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t think I needed a wipe warmer, but the baby cries with cold wipes, so I caved and got this to make diaper changes less stressful for the both of us. It’s nice and warm, not too hot. Never had an issue with wipes drying out, but the flap opening ripped a little. It still works, so it doesn’t bother me too much. I like that you can unplug it and take it to another spot. Overall happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not warm wipes much at all or nothing
customer_reviews.text: Does not warm wipes well at all. just the first maybe 2 come out as if held in regular temp hands which is nothing. The build of it is good and lock feature(for older toddlera who are curious but it isnt very hot inside..Wipes on bottom stay cold. Heating from top may sound good but does not work here because heat does not travel down to wipes. I got the ncvi nevi wipe warmer and that one warma the wipes way more! like if used microwave which we were doing before this.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't warm for me
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this warmer in January in preparation for baby in August. Unfortunately, it only warms sporadically. I went with this brand due to the high reviews. I used another brand with our first baby and it worked great except the lid never stayed shut. But it still warmed as it was suppose to do. I thought this warmer would actually do both (stay shut and warm) but apparently that's too much to ask. I gave it 2 stars because it does have a little light (that works) on it that helps with those late night diaper changes
customer_reviews.author: Wendi

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have really loved this wipe warmer. We have used it since my son was a newborn, and he is now 8.5 months old. It does a good job of just warming the wipes enough to take the chill off, which is great, especially for the middle of the night diaper changes. I have never had an issue with it drying out the wipes, we use them before I ever have to think about adding water. I would 100% buy this item again. It's been great!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria AndrewsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok if you live in a warm climate but if it’s cold the wipes will not be as comfortable as could be
customer_reviews.text: Buy the other brand. There is a cheaper one and the warmth of these don’t make it from the warmer to your baby’s body in time. It’s ok if you live in a warm climate but if it’s cold the wipes will not be as comfortable as could be. I tried my friends warmer and it was warm enough to last to my baby’s bottom so as not to let him feel a cold shock during a night changing.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie T.

customer_reviews.title: At first I loved this diaper warmer
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved this diaper warmer. I ordered both this one and Lionheart one and I returned the Lionheart one because the opening where the wipes come out was too tight and this one was just right. Now that we've had this one for a month, the opening no longer holds the next wipe in place--they just fall through and back into the container. I thought it was the water wipes so I switched to wipes with more texture but the same thing happened. I will try to return this one and go back to the Lionheart brand. It has a cute little night light, but we never use it, it's not all that helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri A.

customer_reviews.title: Best wipe warmer out there
customer_reviews.text: Love my wipe warmer. Use it every single day for 4 months and haven’t had any issues yet. Keeps wipes warm without drying them out and has a long cord so you can move it around as needed for diaper changing. Stays plugged in and on all the time and never had any problems. One thing I wish was that it had a larger capacity, sometimes I have to split the package of wipes and put in a baggie because a whole packages of wet wipes won’t fit into the container at once.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This was a must that really helped make changing just a little better. I actually didn't like to use the Costco wipes with this. They never stayed together for a continuous pull. The Pure Pampers kind worked much better and stayed super moist. The light isn't bright enough to change by but it's a nice feature. The look of this is really nice and I loved the directions that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Haylee H

customer_reviews.title: Variable temperature
customer_reviews.text: This is the only wipe warmer I've ever tried, and it's say it does a fairly good job at what it should do. The biggest thing I notice is a lot of variability in the warmth of the wipes. Sometimes they feel fairly warm, and sometimes not much at all. We add some water every time we add new wipes and have never had problems with them being too dry. Overall it is adequate to continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: Great at keeping the top couple lukewarm. But if you need more than two it seems they won’t be as warm. I get the wipes are not supposed to be steaming hot, but they could be a little warmer. The lid does not snap shut, rather just lifts open. They tend to dry out faster (than the prince lionheart with their little moisture pillow). Overall does what it markets, just a couple flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Worth it to splurge on this !
customer_reviews.text: If your baby hates diaper changes like mine lol try this !! Definitely worth every penny. I was hesitant to buy because most parents say it doesn’t stay warm, but this one literally keeps all the wipes warm for every change! My baby boy used to scream when the cold wipes would touch him, but the warmth from the baby wipe warmer makes it more tolerable for him.
customer_reviews.author: Treydan’s Mommy ♥️

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal and affordable :)
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price ! At first I was skeptical for safety purposes, but it’s been 2 months and not one problem or red flag my Baby boy is happy so I’m happy. I also read a couple reviews about wipe warmers drying out the wipes. thats not true. they probably didn’t follow the directions provided. I add a Half a cup of warm water to every pack I refill it with and the wipes are fine !
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Design flaws
customer_reviews.text: This wipe warmer lacks a spring loaded platform that pushes the wipes up to the opening. I’m constantly needing to stop in the middle of a change to unlock the top, open it up, and pull a wipe through the opening. And I have to do it with one hand because I have to hold on to the baby with the other hand. Also the temperature control is inconsistent. The topmost wipe gets quite warm and the ones under it are room temp. Finally the nightlight feature is just useless. The light isn’t bright enough to make anything visible in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: rsw

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice design and quality. But it simply doesn't warm wipes (enough). If you've got a brand new pack of wipes up to the top, the top few wipes will be a little warm. After that they're room temperature or cool/cold. Our child cried when we used the wipes out of this device- a show stopper for us. I know the manufacturer will espouse that it doesn't produce HOT!/very warm wipes. But that's an understatement. Other than when full, it's an expensive wipe holder. They're no different than out of the pack.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Must have for our newborn that we bought 2
customer_reviews.text: Our newborn used to scream bloody murder when we used cold wet wipes on him. Ever since we got the warmer, he's been a happy camper during diaper changes so we ended up buying 2 of these. One for the nursery and one for the 1st floor. I do wish I can control the temperature since the wipes could use more warmth. Also, why does it only fit 60-80 wipes when most wipe packages come with 100. We either have to split the wipes into 2 containers or leave the 20 in the package which dries out.
customer_reviews.author: idkalexj

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: As a FTM, I read a lot of things saying you don't need a wipe warmer. But personally, my LO responded much nicer with a warmer wipe on her butt than a cold one! The locking feature is a bit odd, one side doesn't seem to lock. And it has been a bit fickle with turning off (could have been our plug). Otherwise it's worked well. I really like the light feature where you can check if you've run out of wipes by turning the light on rather than opening it every time.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Blasi

customer_reviews.title: This is great... Does not dry out wipes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new grandbaby. The new mommy and daddy love it, and the baby doesn’t cry as much now that he has a warm wipe... My daughter said that it was a game changer! They didn’t originally asked for it on their baby registry because they had read reviews about warmers drying out the wet wipes... That absolutely does not happen with this product! We are recommending this wipe warmer to all of our friends!
customer_reviews.author: Shello

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be warmer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our bedrooms changing station so I wouldn’t walk to the baby room. The design is very cute but it’s not warm. It keeps it a little warmer than room temperature but still cool to where my baby gets startled by the coldness. I still use it because I’ve never sent a product back and just don’t have the time to do it. I would recommend for the makers to make it a little warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made diaper changing a much more pleasurable experience
customer_reviews.text: This made diaper changing much more pleasurable! Most people say a wipe warmer is unnecessary, but we went from having screaming diaper changing with our newborn to smiling ones! HIGHLY recommend this product! It keeps the wipes moist and doesn't dry them out. Perfect temperature. Only complaint is that certain brand wipes don't fit the whole pack. (Specifically the up&up brand from target) we simply put the few extra into a regular wipe holder to leave in the living room for emergencies. Not a big deal for us and it seems like all the name brand wipes we've tried fit the whole pack. But worth mentioning if that's a deal breaker for you!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen stollar

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, Dependable Warm Wipes
customer_reviews.text: We were just blessed with our first grandchild and our daughter told us how she hated and cried from cold wet wipes. My sister recommended this product, I read the reviews and ordered it for them and they LOVE this product. I arrived as promised and has worked flawlessly. No more crying over cold wipes!
customer_reviews.author: Roy Foster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect temperature
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 4.5 rating. The only reason why I would take away the half star is because it doesn't dispense one wipe at a time. When you pull the wipes you get a lot all at once. The temperature control is great and doesn't dry out the wipes. The night light is dim and allows you to turn on and off with the button.
customer_reviews.author: Lorell Constantino

customer_reviews.title: ... because baby skin is sensitive but it would be better if there were at least a little more warm ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if any wipes warmers get the wipes hot but these don't They do say that it is on purpose because baby skin is sensitive but it would be better if there were at least a little more warm cos they get cold fast. Regardless, the baby loves this and does not cringe every time we change him especially at night. Otherwise I like the night light and it's ready to use and easy to set up. The wipes come out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Warms the wipes to a good temperature
customer_reviews.text: This is very essential as it comes wiping off especially when there is air condition in the house and the wipes get cold. It also warms it up to a goos temperature. However, the only thing that I did not like about this is that I have to leave it on the plug. When I turn it off, it gets cold very fast. It is for sure none travel item but I would have liked to be able to pretain the temperature or at least be able to use batteries so I will not have to transfer it with me feom room to room and having to plug it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: A product you didn't think you needed...
customer_reviews.text: I always scoffed at baby wipe warmers thinking they were the epitome of first world problems... then my husband suggested that our baby didn't enjoy cold wipes in the middle of the winter. We ordered it and she never seems annoyed at getting cleaned anymore! This seems to be one of few that plug in as opposed to be battery-operated and I like the plug. Just remember to get the "continuous" wipes like the Amazone brand. The popular WaterWipes are a good brand but they are not continuous so wouldn't work in a dispenser like this.
customer_reviews.author: Sven5000

customer_reviews.title: Rather pointless - Wipes do not retain temperature after removal
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it is supposed to - heats your wipes to a nice, comfortably warm temperature. The problem is that a wipe does not retain heat at all and goes to air temperature in a second or less. To make sure our little guy gets to enjoy the warmth I quickly remove the wipe and immediately place where they need to be wiped. That way they get a fraction of a second of warmth and then it at least only cools down to surface body temperature and not colder air temperature. I think we'd be fine without it but we've got it so we'll use it.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Esquandolas

customer_reviews.title: Better ones out there
customer_reviews.text: Even tough this one cost a little more, I went ahead and ordered because I read good reviews plus I wanted to support a small business. I have another wipe warmer (different name brand) and it works better because it warms the wipes from the top and bottom. This one only warms from the top so if your wipes aren’t loaded through the top they won’t heat. Or if you happen too need several wipes only the few on the top are warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and so easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed. The wipes are perfectly warm so there is no shock, especially during nighttime changing. Be warned that they are not hot, but no dice warmer makes them hot because then they would totally dry out. It warms it just enough so that the wipes aren't freezing. And it is so easy to use unlike all other dipe warmers that require pads, this one you just put it a little bit of water each time you add wipes and totally hassle free. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait?
customer_reviews.text: I never bought a wipe warmer because people on " must have " sites and reviews said it was a waste of money. I don't know what planet they live on . this wipe warmer is amazing, We have 9 wk old twins and they will now sleep through a diaper change. I can't tell you how in love we are with this, I have thought about putting flushable wipes in it and placing it in my bathroom when the babies are done with it. One of the best purchases I have made for the babies!
customer_reviews.author: Lois B. Caryl

customer_reviews.title: Worked OK for a while... then broke
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these and both of them have issues with their plugs, which started after about 2-3 months of use. When they worked, they were great. They kept the wipes at a nice warm temperature as long as we added the right amount of water when we added new ones. However, both plugs appear to have a defect where they’ll just stop providing power to the warmer despite not being moved. At this point (12 months of use), they do not stay powered more than 15 minutes. Our outlets work fine. I probably would not purchase this wipes warmer again and I only gave it 3 stars since they did work well ...when they worked.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

product_meta.title: Wipe Warmer and Baby Wet Wipes Dispenser | Holder | Case with Changing Light
feature_bullets: TAKES THE JOLT OUT OF COLD BABY WIPES - Cold wipes shock a baby’s sensitive skin, making your baby irritable and fussy. Warm wipes soothe and calm your baby, especially during late night changes!
OVER 1,000,000 UNITS SOLD - Quality you can trust.  One of the most popular, time-tested wipe warmer dispensers ever ships in a beautiful gift box.  There is simply no better warmer at any price!

GUARANTEED TO ALWAYS STAY MOIST - Innovative silicone seal locks in moisture and heat, preventing wet wipes from drying out and turning brown.  The TOP-HEATED DESIGN cleverly keeps the wipes at the top of the box the warmest.

BUILT IN CHANGING LIGHT softly illuminates the changing table so you do not have to turn on the bright lights of the room during a late night diaper change. The night light will automatically shut off in 10 minutes.

HIGH CAPACITY CASE HOLDS ALL WIPE BRANDS - Store up to a week’s worth of your favorite diaper wipes.  The universal container does not require any specific type of wipe, including flushable wipes... and with our VIEWING LENS, you’ll never run out mid-change.
LOW VOLTAGE POWER ADAPTER FOR ULTIMATE SAFETY -  Register online for YOUR FREE LIFETIME WARRANTY

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars5,390 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
